title: Screen Battle Royale
brief_description: 4 short works from participants in the Screen Education digital mixing and animation program for Secondary Schools. Part of the ACMI 2004: Australian Culture Now suite of programs. Groups include Art Start groups 1 and 2, Kingswood College and Belgrave Heights Christian School.</
